sentences.sContent: Except the fashion-forward hoppers among you, who will of course be looking to tighten the ligature around your upper arms while gazing at the packaging for the as-yet unreleased Jacob Smack.
sentences.sContent_eng: Except the fashion-forward hoppers among you, who will of course be looking to tighten the ligature around your upper arms while gazing at the packaging for the as-yet unreleased Jacob Smack.
sentences.sCn: 除去你周围那些时尚前卫的嘻哈人士，你希望谁在凝视给至今未释放的雅各布·斯曼克的包裹时收紧缠住你上臂的带子呢？
